name: Silent Town Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Silent Town Escape

Description: You need to go to another town before night time. It's either figure out a way to fill up your truck or spend a night in the town. Good Luck and Have Fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/silent-town-escape/

Game Pixel Size: 800x500

Game Image: http://www.freeroomescape.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/Silent-Town-Escape-588x300.jpg

Game File: http://www.freeroomescape.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/silent-town-escape-1.swf

Walkthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aLHHekJSk00

Regards,

FreeRoomEscape.com
